name: lspsnsubg

stmt.origin: lspsncl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(clss, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(clss, c0)))

⊣ c3 =(LSpan ` c0)

comment: The span of a singleton is an additive subgroup (frequently used special case of ~ lspcl ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
